relation: Do these needs to be fields, or are they only used in openConnection()?
move to plexus-utils or use something appropriate from there

[BP]: refactor out the PathUtils URL stuff into a class like java.net.URL, so you only parse once can't use URL class as is because it won't recognise our protocols, though perhaps we could attempt to register handlers for scp, etc?
